string.text: LAKE YANTAR
Reach the mobile science lab

Here we are — we've finally landed in the area of operation. I've decided to leave Sky to protect the pilot, and ordered him to attempt to establish communication through a satelite to keep us informed of what's going on around here. The others and I are going to examine the scientists' bunker. I hope we'll find all the answers we need there, as scouring the whole area won't be a pleasant experience.
Examine the area around the bunker
While Hottab deals with unlocking the bunker door, we should comb the area around the bunker. We might find something of interest to us.
Return to Hottab
Hottab managed to remove the bunker door. Time to return to him.
Gather all information inside the bunker

HQ's primary objective is to collect all information that touches on the scientists' past research at Lake Yantar. I'll need to grab everything — all loose documentation, scientists' personal PDAs and data storage devices. I'll start with the bunker — going in all alone to avoid the extra noise.
Bring the collected information to Sky

I gathered all the information I could found inside the scientists' bunker. Everyone inside was either deceased or zombified, including Professor Sakharov himself. Everything I found needs to be brought to Sky. He'll decode some of it, after which we'll decide how to proceed next.
SOMETHING IN THE SILENCE
Talk to Vuslych
Vuslych spotted something from his vantage point. I'll go see what he says.
Talk to Koval

We've spotted a strange anomaly located in the swamp by the mobile lab. I have decided that me and Koval will head there for a scouting mission. Might as well put him through his paces while we're at it.
Reach the site of the anomaly with Koval

One of our objectives set by central command is to locate and collect data about what happened at Lake Yantar. This also includes data on anomalous formations. I'm guessing that's why Koval was assigned to our squad, being well-versed in anomalies.
Talk to Koval
The strange smoke disappeared as we got closer. I need to discuss what to do next with Koval.
Provide cover for Koval

Koval claims he's never seen such an anomaly before... If that thing even was an anomaly after all. Gathering intelligence on it wouldn't hurt our mission. Koval will set up his device, while I provde cover.
SURVIVOR
Check the source of the signal
It appears someone survived. Their PDA signal was picked up not far from us. I'll go scout around the area.
Take the stalker back to camp

We've found our first survivor in Yantar. He should be able to clear up recent events and help provide us with a complete picture of everything that happened. To begin with, I should take him to camp and let him come to his senses — he's been through a lot for sure.
Interrogate the stalker

I need to get as much information as I can out of that stalker that I rescued, and find out what he knows about the scientists' work at Yantar, as well as question him on that black smoke that was chasing him.
DISAPPEARANCE
Find Koval
Koval's not answering his radio. I need to examine the area where I last saw him.
Wait for Koval to show up
The dimwit disappeared somewhere... At this point, I don't believe anything bad happened to him, so I'll just wait until he shows up again. In the meantime, I'll get around to other objectives.
Track down Koval by his signal
Koval's gone radio silent, but I've managed to pick up his PDA signal near the local arch anomaly. I'll have to see if I can locate him. What's he even doing there in the first place?...
Help Koval fight off the mutants
Koval ran into mutants by the arch anomaly. I must help him fight them off.
Talk to Koval
The mutants are dead. I need to find out why the hell Koval went to this anomaly.
GATHERING INTEL
Talk to Sky
While I was away, Sky might've dug up something from the data we retrieved. I'll need to talk to him.
Collect intel from the marked areas

During our talk, Sky marked several areas on my PDA map, where I would be likely to encounter the bodies of the rest of the scientists who worked at Yantar. I'll have to search the marked areas and retrieve any intel I can find. Hottab and Vuslych have already set off to check the swamp leading to Agroprom. I'll check the area surrounding the factory.
Bring the information to Sky
More things have become clearer to me, but I've still got quite a few questions left unanswered. I'll have to bring Sky everything I found and see if he can extract more info.
BREACH
Activate the cooling station

In order to reach the body of a stalker lying dead near the main entrance to the X-16 laboratory, Sky informed me of a way to reduce the intensity of psy-emissions in the area. Perhaps that stalker may have some useful information capable of shedding light on the events that unfolded here.
Approach the stalker's body
I managed to activate the cooling station. And with that, the emissions practically died down. Now I can get closer to the stalker by the breached laboratory wall.
Search the stalker's body
I fell down into the laboratory ruins along with the body... Well then, I still have to see whether he's got anything relevant to our mission.
CAUGHT IN A TRAP
Find a way out of the laboratory

I wound up inside the laboratory ruins with seemingly no way out. Seems I'm still all in one piece, no fractures or anything, but my radio is smashed in bits and pieces. I'll have to find a way to the surface on my own. On the plus side, this place will likely allow me to piece together everything that happened at Yantar.
Find a way inside the control room
Behind this door must be the main control panel of this dreadful system. Perhaps I'll be able to find something useful there... but first, I have to find a way to get inside.
Examine the dispatcher's room
The dispatcher's room might contain some kind of records of the scientists' final thoughts with each other, or maybe some other useful information.
Examine the control room
I managed to retrieve a key from the body of an army dispatcher. I'm hoping that this is the one that opens the control room, since not many doors here are locked.
Find a way out of the laboratory
I managed to find certain intel regarding the events that unfolded inside the X-16 laboratory. Now I need to find a way out of here.
Talk to Sky
Time to talk to our break-in specialist. He must have fished out something from the intel I previously collected by now.
MYSTERIOUS STRANGER
Find the overnight shelter in the sewer

My encounter with Ivanych turned out unexpectedly. I never thought I'd get to see him alive again. He told me the individual we met around here is not to be trusted. How did he know about that? I'll need to question the stalker once more — Ivanych must have meant him. While I look for the exit, I'll check out his overnight shelter. Ivanych told me it's somewhere in the sewers.
Return to camp and decide how to proceed

A stalker named Matvey told me everything about the mysterious stranger. He lied to me from the very start with the sole purpose of getting out of here. Once I return to camp, I need to decide what to do with him. Leave him here? Take him with us and have him tried? Or even take on the role of judge myself?
SOURCE OF INTERFERENCE
Talk to Vuslych

We were able to retrieve almost all information about the events at Yantar. Now we only have to tacke the issue of the defective emitter. Vuslych will set off with me, along with Koval — I'd rather not leave him in camp.
Breach the hangar
Professor Sytyanov may be located among the zombified stalkers inside the locked hangar next to the mobile science lab. I'll need to breach the hangar, neutralize all occupants and retrieve his PDA.
Find Sytyanov's PDA
The hangar is open. Now I only have to deal with the zombified stalkers and find the PDA device on Professor Sytyanov.
Wait for the data to be decrypted
I managed to find a PDA on Professor Sytyanov's body. I'll need to wait until all the data is extracted from it.
Reach the site
I learned about the location of the emitter. I must to reach the site with my squad and shut it off.
Find out what happened to Koval
Koval stopped all of a sudden. I should find out what happened.
Deactivate the emitter
We reached the target. Now we only have to turn off the emitter. Let's hope everything goes smoothly.
Return to the squad
The emitter is off. I should check up on the squad.
Return to the encampment

We've gathered all possible information on the incident and pieced together everything that happened at Yantar. Comms with Agroprom have been established. Time to return to camp and prepare to head back to base.
Talk to Sky
I need to give Sky the rest of the information I gathered and prepare to depart to Agroprom.
MESSENGER OF JUSTICE
Decide what to do with the Duty deserter
Before heading back, I'll talk to the deserter. I must decide what to do with him.
